headline: Supermicro Stock Is Soaring Today. Should You Buy The Hot AI Stock Before May 6?
summary: Supermicro's stock was boosted by earnings reports from two major tech companies that show AI spending is still going strong.  The company's own preliminary numbers released ahead of the May 6s earnings call paint a troubling picture.  Shares of Super Micro Computer (NASDAQ: SMCI) are rising on Thursday.

headline: Here's Why I'm Staying Away from Super Micro Stock
summary: Super Micro Computer reported preliminary results that fell well short of expectations as customers delayed purchasing decisions.  Artificial intelligence (AI) server manufacturer Super Micro Computer (NASDAQ: SMCI) regained compliance with the Nasdaq exchange earlier this year by filing its outstanding quarterly and annual financial reports.  This type of delay is never good news for investors, but Supermicro was able to remove a big cloud hanging over the stock.
